alert.note: Alert for Eastern Schenectady; Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:53PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. The higher totals will be over the southern Adirondacks, and the Lake George Glens Falls area. * WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, Mohawk Valley, northern Capital Region of Schenectady and southern Saratoga Counties, Lake George northern Saratoga Region of eastern New York. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads and reduced vsibilities in the snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will approach an inch an hour Saturday afternoon into the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
